title: Hour 2 - Chris Mannix (07-17-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Chris Mannix (07-17-20)
description:
Chris Mannix tells Dan about his life in the NBA bubble quarantine. Chris tells Dan that Lebron really trust Rondo and says that if Rondo is not healthy for the first round of the playoffs could prove to be trouble for the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
